SELECT A.categoryId as id ,B.status,B.name,B.parentId,C.name as parentName,B.rootId,D.name as rootName FROM serviceCatalogToCategory A LEFT JOIN trequestCategory B ON A.categoryId=B.id LEFT JOIN trequestCategory C on B.parentId=C.id LEFT JOIN trequestCategory D on B.rootId=D.id WHERE A.catalogId= #{catalogId} AND A.status=1 AND B.status=1
ORDER BY B.id ASC

SELECT A.id ,A.name,A.status,A.parentId,B.name as parentName,A.rootId,C.name as rootName FROM trequestCategory A LEFT JOIN trequestCategory B on A.parentId=B.id LEFT JOIN trequestCategory C on A.rootId=C.id WHERE A.parentId= 0
ORDER BY A.id ASC

SELECT A.id ,A.name,A.status,A.parentId,B.name as parentName,A.rootId,C.name as rootName FROM trequestCategory A LEFT JOIN trequestCategory B on A.parentId=B.id LEFT JOIN trequestCategory C on A.rootId=C.id WHERE A.parentId= 0 AND A.status=1
ORDER BY A.id ASC

SELECT A.id ,A.name,A.parentId,A.status,B.name as parentName,A.rootId,C.name as rootName FROM trequestCategory A LEFT JOIN trequestCategory B on A.parentId=B.id LEFT JOIN trequestCategory C on A.rootId=C.id
WHERE A.parentId= #{categoryId} AND A.status=1
ORDER BY A.id ASC
